channel.title: Why was Gorilla Sto/CopyRight banned again?
channel.description:
Hi, just curious. I was reading this topic:
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,429169.0.html
and was slightly confused why he was banned again? There are several members on this forum that were permanently banned but have come back and have been accepted. He seemed like he didn't want to be that annoying guy on the forum soooo why not just [b]not ban him[/b]? Sounds crazy right? I don't even understand why the topic was locked. Anyway, there's my 2 cents.
~Ron

item.title: Why was Gorilla Sto/CopyRight banned again?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

I can’t believe you guys have forgotten the real reason for why we responded so harshly to him.

Copyright joined in with JDB’s fun when JDB discovered that global moderators could create other global moderator accounts.
Copyright asked for, and received, such an account, and then used it to move internal threads into public forum sections, to ban/mute a large number of users, and to be disruptive in general.
Perhaps I remember more so than the others because it was Mopar and I on at the time that all of the cleaning up took place, which was a real pain in everybody’s arse.

Read full topic
item.source: Why was Gorilla Sto/CopyRight banned again?

item.title: Why was Gorilla Sto/CopyRight banned again?
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

I believe I was the first to ban him, his account was originally Soule or something like that. He was unbanned several times and continued to break rules and get himself banned.

He is to remain banned.

Read full topic
item.source: Why was Gorilla Sto/CopyRight banned again?

item.title: Why was Gorilla Sto/CopyRight banned again?
item.dc:creator: @NewbieNewty Newty
item.description:
@NewbieNewty wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:4, topic:333194”][quote author=Newty link=topic=429611.msg3154284#msg3154284 date=1268867473]
I banned him. To my knowledge any person with multiple accounts is supposed to be banned.

No one should be exempt. A prime example was when Wales33 was made a moderator and then was found to have 2 or 3 other accounts leading to him being demoted and banned.
[/quote]
Whats your suggestion to him being unbanned? Go on IRC? Going on IRC for something like that is a fucking joke.[/quote]

I never suggested he should get unbanned. In my opinion he should definitely be banned, permanently.

Read full topic
item.source: Why was Gorilla Sto/CopyRight banned again?

item.title: Why was Gorilla Sto/CopyRight banned again?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Other people have been unbanned in the past because they have shown maturity by pming an admin and apologising for what they have done.

Making a thread does not seem mature to me, which he claimed to be. All it does is flamebait.

I locked the topic because of the amount of flaming going on.

Read full topic
item.source: Why was Gorilla Sto/CopyRight banned again?

No one should be exempt. A prime example was when Wales33 was made a moderator and then was found to have 2 or 3 other accounts leading to him being demoted and banned.[/quote]
